name: site-stitcher
description: The tool I use to build my website, picostitch.com

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.dev:start: npm run build; npm run serve & ./build-on-file-change.sh
scripts.build: mkdir -p _output; node -r esm src/index.js && npm run build:assets
scripts.build:assets: cp src/templates/style.css _output/ && npm run build:images:png && npm run build:images:jpg

author: Wolfram Kriesing
